nodes.name: computeCSCIndex
computeCSCIndex

computeCSCIndex(address,bytes15).details: calculate the Crypto-Spatial Coordinate (CSC) of the spatial feature

params.dggsIndex: the H3 index of the spatial feature
params.owner: a record holding the owner of the CSC

computeCSCIndex(address,bytes15).return: the Crypto-Spatial Coordinate (CSC) of the spatial feature
